trustfund:
BBGEF-BB GLOBAL ENVIRONMENTAL FUND,TF038172-TUNISIA: INDUSTRIAL ENERGY
            EFFICIENCY PROGRAM,TF054398-GEF-TUNISIA: ENERGY EFFICIENCY
            PROGRAM/INDUSTRIAL SECTOR PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The main objective of the Energy
            Efficiency Program Industrial Sector Project is to overcome
            barriers to the development of a sustainable market for
            energy efficiency products. In addition to the removal of
            institutional and capacity-related barriers, the project
            aims to establish energy services companies (ESCOs) as the
            main vehicle to guarantee a sustainable energy efficiency
            market. The closing date for the project will be extended
            from September 30, 2011 until November 30, 2011. This will
            be the third extension: the original closing date was
            December 31, 2009; a first extension to December 31, 2010
            was granted in July 2009; a second extension to September
            30, 2011 was granted in December 2010. The project's
            audit report for 2009 has been recognized by the World Bank
            as acceptable. A reallocation of funds also took place in
            July 2010, totaling USD 625,000. USD 225,000 were
            reallocated to the guarantee and USD 400,000 to the
            Technical Assistance (TA), leading to the current budgets of
            USD 3.725 million and USD 2 million, respectively.
